mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.KAISYA_CD AS KAISYACD, s.SHR_SYORI_NO AS SHRSYORINO, s.MAIN_TORI_CD AS MAINTORICD, s.KAK_TORI_KMK AS KAKTORIKMK, s.SHR_DATE AS SHRDATE, s.SIME_DATE AS SIMEDATE, s.FRI_END_DATE AS FRIENDDATE, s.SHR_KIN AS SHRKIN, s.SOTO_TAX_KIN AS SOTOTAXKIN, s.SHR_KIN_ALL AS SHRKINALL, s.JOTAI_KBN AS JOTAIKBN, s.GETUJ_YM AS GETUJYM, s.TEKIYO AS TEKIYO FROM K003RSHR s, M011TRIM t WHERE s.MAIN_TORI_CD = t.TRI_CD AND s.KAISYA_CD = #{kaisyaCd} AND s.JOTAI_KBN = #{jotaiKbn} ORDER BY s.SHR_DATE, s.MAIN_TORI_CD, s.KAK_TORI_KMK, s.TEKIYO
